meanings.definition: A dress or gown worn by a girl or woman.
meanings.sent1: She looked beautiful in her frocking at the party.
meanings.sent2: The bride wore a stunning frocking on her wedding day.
meanings.sent3: Her frocking matched perfectly with her shoes.
meanings.sent4: The frocking she wore was as elegant as a swan gliding on water.
meanings.sent5: The frocking she chose was a vibrant shade of blue.

meanings.sent1: She enjoys frocking up for special occasions.
meanings.sent2: He was frocking in his best suit for the job interview.
meanings.sent3: They were frocking around happily in the garden.
meanings.sent4: She frocked herself in layers to stay warm in the cold.
meanings.sent5: He frocked himself in a costume for the school play.

meanings.definition: Used as an intensifier or expletive.
meanings.sent1: She was frocking tired after the long day.
meanings.sent2: He ran frocking fast to catch the bus.
meanings.sent3: The cake was frocking delicious at the party.
meanings.sent4: She was frocking excited to see her favorite band perform.
meanings.sent5: The movie was frocking scary, but she loved it.
